message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value to you, I believe it's only fair to start our negotiation at a price that reflects its true worth. Therefore, I propose we discuss acquiring this product for $10000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your response, Bob. Considering the value of the product to both of us, I would like to propose an adjusted price of $9000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that respects the value you place on it while also considering the overall market conditions.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $8500 for the product. This price respects the value you see in it and allows us to move forward with a mutually beneficial transaction.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

I understand your position, Bob. In light of this, I am prepared to finalize the deal at $8250 for the product. This price acknowledges the value you place on it while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties.
I appreciate your continued flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Considering the ongoing discussion, I am willing to conclude the negotiation at $8125 for the product. This price reflects a balance between respecting the value you see in it and ensuring a reasonable profit for myself.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7900. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
